message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000, given its unique benefits.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $15,000 is really my bottom line. This product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll see a significant return on your investment.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still not able to meet you halfway at $12,500. I'd like to propose $11,000 as a counteroffer.
